description: Landscaping and remodelling of basin  head to form civic space and entrance to canal basin.
site_name: Towpath North Of Regent'S Canal From Wharf Rd To Danbury St
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Notwithstanding the approved drawings the precise siting of the proposed ventilation chimneys shall be agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to any work commencing on site.

REASON:  The precise internal engineering details of the ventilation equipment to be concealed underneath the decking area and connected to the ventilation chimneys, has not been finalised and therefore may need to be adjusted marginally.  Furthermore the re-siting of the ventilation chimneys further east would improve the visual appearance of the upper level of the Civic Space.  Further details are therefore required to ensure the proposed siting complies with policies D1 and D2 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
